00039 typedef dfsch_object_t object_t;

00043 DFSCH_DEFINE_FORM_IMPL(if, "Conditional operator"){
00044   object_t* test;
00045   object_t* consequent;
00046   object_t* alternate;
00047 
00048   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(args,test);
00049   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(args,consequent);
00050   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG_OPT(args,alternate, NULL);
00051 
00052   test = dfsch_eval(test, env);
00053 
00054   return dfsch_eval_tr((test?consequent:alternate), env, esc);
00055 }
00056 
00057 DFSCH_DEFINE_FORM_IMPL(when, "Execute body only when condition is true"){
00058   object_t* test;
00059 
00060   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(args,test);
00061 
00062   if (dfsch_eval(test, env)){
00063     return dfsch_eval_proc_tr(args, env, esc);
00064   }
00065 
00066   return NULL;
00067 }
00068 
00069 DFSCH_DEFINE_FORM_IMPL(unless, "Execute body only when condition is not true"){
00070   object_t* test;
00071 
00072   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(args,test);
00073 
00074   if (!dfsch_eval(test, env)){
00075     return dfsch_eval_proc_tr(args, env, esc);
00076   }
00077 
00078   return NULL;
00079 }
00080

00082 DFSCH_DEFINE_FORM_IMPL(cond, NULL){
00083   object_t* i = args;
00084 
00085   while (dfsch_pair_p(i)){
00086     object_t *o = dfsch_eval(dfsch_car(dfsch_car(i)), env);
00087     if (o){
00088       object_t* exp = dfsch_cdr(dfsch_car(i));
00089       if (dfsch_car(exp) == DFSCH_SYM_BOLD_RIGHT_ARROW){
00090         object_t* proc = dfsch_eval(dfsch_list_item(exp, 1), env);
00091 
00092         return dfsch_apply(proc, dfsch_list(1, o));
00093       }else{
00094         return dfsch_eval_proc_tr(exp, env, esc);
00095       }
00096     }
00097     
00098     i = dfsch_cdr(i); 
00099   }
00100 
00101   return NULL;
00102 }
00103 DFSCH_DEFINE_FORM_IMPL(case, NULL){
00104   object_t* val;
00105   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(args, val);
00106 
00107   val = dfsch_eval(val, env);
00108 
00109   while (dfsch_pair_p(args)){
00110     object_t* c = dfsch_car(args);
00111     object_t* i = dfsch_car(c);
00112     if (i == DFSCH_SYM_ELSE)
00113       return dfsch_eval_proc_tr(dfsch_cdr(c), env, esc);
00114       
00115     while (dfsch_pair_p(i)){
00116       if (dfsch_eqv_p(dfsch_car(i), val))
00117         return dfsch_eval_proc_tr(dfsch_cdr(c), env, esc);
00118       i = dfsch_cdr(i);
00119     }
00120     args = dfsch_cdr(args);
00121   }
00122   
00123   return NULL;
00124   
00125 }
00126 
00127 DFSCH_DEFINE_FORM_IMPL(quote, NULL){
00128   object_t* value;
00129   
00130   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(args, value);
00131   DFSCH_ARG_END(args);
00132 
00133   return value;
00134 }

00136 DFSCH_DEFINE_FORM_IMPL(quasiquote, NULL){ 
00137   /* This is non-trivial to compile right */
00138   object_t* arg;
00139   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(args, arg);
00140   DFSCH_ARG_END(args);
00141 
00142   return dfsch_quasiquote(env,arg);
00143 }

00145 DFSCH_DEFINE_FORM_IMPL(begin, NULL){
00146   return dfsch_eval_proc_tr(args, env, esc);
00147 }
00148 DFSCH_DEFINE_FORM_IMPL(let, NULL){
00149   object_t *vars;
00150   object_t *code;
00151 
00152   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(args, vars);
00153   DFSCH_ARG_REST(args, code);
00154 
00155   object_t* ext_env = dfsch_new_frame(env);
00156 
00157   if (dfsch_symbol_p(vars)){ // named-let
00158     object_t* name = vars;
00159 
00160     object_t* ll_head = NULL;
00161     object_t* ll_tail = NULL;
00162     object_t* vl_head = NULL;
00163     object_t* vl_tail = NULL;
00164 
00165     object_t* lambda;
00166 
00167     DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(code, vars);
00168 
00169     while (dfsch_pair_p(vars)){
00170       object_t* var = dfsch_list_item(dfsch_car(vars),0);
00171       object_t* val = dfsch_eval(dfsch_list_item(dfsch_car(vars),1), env);
00172       
00173       if (ll_head && vl_head){
00174         object_t* tmp;
00175         
00176         tmp = dfsch_cons(var, NULL);
00177         dfsch_set_cdr(ll_tail, tmp);
00178         ll_tail = tmp;
00179 
00180         tmp = dfsch_cons(val, NULL);
00181         dfsch_set_cdr(vl_tail, tmp);
00182         vl_tail = tmp;
00183       }else{
00184         ll_head = ll_tail = dfsch_cons(var, NULL);
00185         vl_head = vl_tail = dfsch_cons(val, NULL);
00186       }
00187 
00188       vars = dfsch_cdr(vars);
00189     }
00190 
00191     lambda = dfsch_named_lambda(ext_env, ll_head, code, name);
00192     dfsch_define(name, lambda, ext_env);
00193 
00194     return dfsch_apply_tr(lambda, vl_head, esc);
00195   }
00196 
00197   while (dfsch_pair_p(vars)){
00198     object_t* var = dfsch_list_item(dfsch_car(vars),0);
00199     object_t* val = dfsch_eval(dfsch_list_item(dfsch_car(vars),1), env);
00200 
00201     dfsch_define(var, val, ext_env);
00202     
00203     vars = dfsch_cdr(vars);
00204   }
00205 
00206   return dfsch_eval_proc_tr(code,ext_env, esc);
00207 }
00208 DFSCH_DEFINE_FORM_IMPL(letrec, NULL){
00209 
00210   object_t *vars;
00211   object_t *code;
00212 
00213   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(args, vars);
00214   DFSCH_ARG_REST(args, code);
00215 
00216   object_t* ext_env = dfsch_new_frame(env);
00217 
00218   while (dfsch_pair_p(vars)){
00219     object_t* var = dfsch_list_item(dfsch_car(vars),0);
00220     object_t* val = dfsch_eval(dfsch_list_item(dfsch_car(vars),1), ext_env);
00221 
00222     dfsch_define(var, val, ext_env);
00223     
00224     vars = dfsch_cdr(vars);
00225   }
00226 
00227   return dfsch_eval_proc_tr(code,ext_env, esc);
00228 }
00229 DFSCH_DEFINE_FORM_IMPL(let_seq, NULL){
00230   object_t *vars;
00231   object_t *code;
00232 
00233   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(args, vars);
00234   DFSCH_ARG_REST(args, code);
00235 
00236   object_t* ext_env = env;
00237 
00238   while (dfsch_pair_p(vars)){
00239     object_t* var = dfsch_list_item(dfsch_car(vars),0);
00240     object_t* val = dfsch_eval(dfsch_list_item(dfsch_car(vars),1), ext_env);
00241 
00242     ext_env = dfsch_new_frame(ext_env);
00243     dfsch_define(var, val, ext_env);
00244     
00245     vars = dfsch_cdr(vars);
00246   }
00247 
00248   return dfsch_eval_proc_tr(code, ext_env, esc);
00249 }

00253 //
00254 // EVAL + APPLY

00258 static object_t* native_eval(void *baton, object_t* args, dfsch_tail_escape_t* esc){
00259   object_t* expr;
00260   object_t* env;
00261 
00262   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(args, expr);
00263   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(args, env);
00264   DFSCH_ARG_END(args);
00265 
00266   return dfsch_eval_tr(expr, env, esc);
00267 }
00268 static object_t* native_eval_proc(void *baton, object_t* args, dfsch_tail_escape_t* esc){
00269   object_t* proc;
00270   object_t* env;
00271 
00272   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(args, proc);
00273   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(args, env);
00274   DFSCH_ARG_END(args);
00275 
00276   return dfsch_eval_proc_tr(proc, env, esc);
00277 }
00278 static object_t* native_apply(void *baton, object_t* args, 
00279                               dfsch_tail_escape_t* esc){
00280 
00281   /* TODO: free arguments */
00282   
00283   object_t* func;
00284   object_t* arglist;
00285 
00286   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(args, func);
00287   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(args, arglist);
00288   DFSCH_ARG_END(args);
00289 
00290   return dfsch_apply_tr(func, arglist, esc);
00291 }

00294 //

00299 DFSCH_DEFINE_FORM_IMPL(unwind_protect, NULL){
00300   object_t* protect;
00301   object_t* ret;
00302   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(args, protect);
00303  
00304   DFSCH_UNWIND {
00305     dfsch_eval(protect, env);
00306   } DFSCH_PROTECT {
00307     ret = dfsch_eval_proc(args, env);
00308   } DFSCH_PROTECT_END;
00309 
00310   return ret;
00311 }
00312 
00313 DFSCH_DEFINE_FORM_IMPL(catch, NULL){
00314   object_t* tag;
00315   object_t* ret;
00316   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(args, tag);
00317   
00318   tag = dfsch_eval(tag, env);
00319 
00320   DFSCH_CATCH_BEGIN(tag) {
00321     ret = dfsch_eval_proc(args, env);
00322   } DFSCH_CATCH {
00323     ret = DFSCH_CATCH_VALUE;
00324   } DFSCH_CATCH_END;
00325 
00326   return ret;
00327 }
00328 
00329 DFSCH_DEFINE_PRIMITIVE(throw, 0){
00330   dfsch_object_t* tag;
00331   dfsch_object_t* value;
00332   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(args, tag);
00333   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(args, value);
00334   
00335   dfsch_throw(tag, value);
00336   return NULL;
00337 }

00341 //
00342 // do
00343 //
00345 
00346 DFSCH_DEFINE_FORM_IMPL(do, "Iterative loop"){
00347   object_t* vars;
00348   object_t* test;
00349   object_t* exprs;
00350   object_t* commands;
00351   object_t* lenv;
00352   object_t* i;
00353 
00354   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(args, vars);
00355   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(args, test);
00356   
00357   commands = args;
00358   exprs = dfsch_cdr(test);
00359   test = dfsch_car(test);
00360 
00361   lenv = dfsch_new_frame(env);
00362 
00363   i = vars;
00364   while (dfsch_pair_p(i)){
00365     object_t* j = dfsch_car(i);
00366     object_t* name;
00367     object_t* init;
00368     object_t* step;
00369 
00370     DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(j, name);
00371     DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(j, init);
00372 
00373     dfsch_define(name, dfsch_eval(init, env), lenv);
00374 
00375     i = dfsch_cdr(i);
00376   }
00377 
00378   while (dfsch_eval(test, lenv) == NULL){
00379     object_t* nenv;
00380     dfsch_eval_proc(commands, lenv);
00381 
00382     nenv = dfsch_new_frame(env);
00383     i = vars;
00384     while (dfsch_pair_p(i)){
00385       object_t* j = dfsch_car(i);
00386       object_t* name;
00387       object_t* init;
00388       object_t* step;
00389       
00390       DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(j, name);
00391       DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(j, init);
00392       DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG_OPT(j, step, name);
00393 
00394       dfsch_define(name, dfsch_eval(step, lenv), nenv);
00395       
00396       i = dfsch_cdr(i);
00397     }
00398     lenv = nenv;
00399   }
00400 
00401   return dfsch_eval_proc_tr(exprs, lenv, esc);
00402 }
00403 
00404 DFSCH_DEFINE_FORM_IMPL(dolist, "Iterate over list contents"){
00405   dfsch_object_t* farg;
00406   dfsch_object_t* variable;
00407   dfsch_object_t* list;
00408   dfsch_object_t* body;
00409   dfsch_object_t* result = NULL;
00410 
00411   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(args, farg);
00412   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(farg, variable);
00413   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(farg, list);
00414   DFSCH_ARG_REST(args, body);
00415 
00416   list = dfsch_eval(list, env);
00417   while (DFSCH_PAIR_P(list)){
00418     dfsch_object_t* inner_env = dfsch_new_frame(env);
00419     dfsch_define(variable, DFSCH_FAST_CAR(list), inner_env);
00420     result = dfsch_eval_proc(body, inner_env);
00421     list = DFSCH_FAST_CDR(list);
00422   }
00423 
00424   if (list){
00425     dfsch_cerror("Not a proper list", list);
00426   }
00427 
00428   return result;
00429 }

00432 DFSCH_DEFINE_FORM_IMPL(destructuring_bind, NULL){
00433   dfsch_object_t *arglist;
00434   dfsch_object_t *list;
00435   dfsch_object_t *code;
00436 
00437   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(args, arglist);
00438   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(args, list);
00439   DFSCH_ARG_REST(args, code);
00440 
00441   list = dfsch_eval(list, env);
00442 
00443   return dfsch_eval_proc_tr(code, 
00444                             dfsch_destructuring_bind(arglist, 
00445                                                      list, 
00446                                                      env), 
00447                             esc);
00448 }

00454 void dfsch__control_register(dfsch_object_t *ctx){ 
00455   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "begin", DFSCH_FORM_REF(begin));
00456   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "let", DFSCH_FORM_REF(let));
00457   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "let*", DFSCH_FORM_REF(let_seq));
00458   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "letrec", DFSCH_FORM_REF(letrec));
00459 
00460   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "quasiquote", DFSCH_FORM_REF(quasiquote));
00461   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "quote", DFSCH_FORM_REF(quote));
00462   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "if", DFSCH_FORM_REF(if));
00463   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "when", DFSCH_FORM_REF(when));
00464   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "unless", DFSCH_FORM_REF(unless));
00465   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "cond", DFSCH_FORM_REF(cond));
00466   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "case", DFSCH_FORM_REF(case));
00467 
00468   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "unwind-protect", DFSCH_FORM_REF(unwind_protect));
00469   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "catch", DFSCH_FORM_REF(catch));
00470   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "throw", DFSCH_PRIMITIVE_REF(throw));
00471 
00472   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "eval", dfsch_make_primitive(&native_eval,NULL));
00473   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "eval-proc", dfsch_make_primitive(&native_eval_proc,
00474                                                           NULL));
00475   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "apply", dfsch_make_primitive(&native_apply,NULL));
00476 
00477   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "do", DFSCH_FORM_REF(do));
00478   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "dolist", DFSCH_FORM_REF(dolist));
00479 
00480   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "destructuring-bind", 
00481                     DFSCH_FORM_REF(destructuring_bind));
00482 }
